common.title: No-Install Utilities
common.description: Web-based utility tools for developers and general users, no login required

home.title: No-Install Utilities
home.subtitle: Web-based utility tools for developers and general users, no login required

fast.title: Fast & Easy
fast.description: Use directly in your web browser without installation

secure.title: Secure Processing
secure.description: All data is processed only in your browser (except IP utility)

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Works on all devices - PC, tablet, and mobile

index.title: Utilities
index.description: Collection of various web-based utility tools

characterCounter.title: Character Counter
characterCounter.description: Count characters, words, and bytes in real-time

info.title: Usage Guide
info.item1: Statistics update in real-time as you type
info.item2: Korean characters count as 3 bytes each in UTF-8
info.item3: English letters and numbers are 1 byte, special characters are 1-4 bytes
info.item4: Words are separated by spaces and line breaks

myIp.title: My IP Address
myIp.description: Check your current IP address and location information
myIp.subtitle: Check your current IP address and location information

info.title: Information
info.item1: The displayed IP address is your current public IP address
info.item2: May differ from actual location if using VPN or proxy
info.item3: Location information is approximate and may not be accurate
info.item4: ISP stands for Internet Service Provider

info.title: What is UUID?
info.item1: UUID stands for Universally Unique Identifier
info.item3: Uniqueness is guaranteed with extremely low collision probability
info.item4: Used for database IDs, filenames, session IDs, etc.

info.title: Secure Password Tips
info.item2: Include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols
info.item3: Avoid dictionary words or personal information
info.item4: Use different passwords for each account

hashGenerator.title: Hash Generator
hashGenerator.description: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512 hashes
hashGenerator.subtitle: Convert text to hash values

info.title: Hash Function Information
info.item1: MD5: 128-bit hash, not recommended for security
info.item2: SHA-1: 160-bit hash, used in legacy systems
info.item3: SHA-256: 256-bit hash, current standard cryptographic hash

qrGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrGenerator.description: Convert text or URL to QR code
qrGenerator.subtitle: Enter text or URL to convert to QR code
qrGenerator.placeholder: Enter text or URL to convert to QR code...
qrGenerator.noQrText:
Enter text to
generate QR code

info.title: Usage Guide
info.item1: Convert various information like URLs, text, phone numbers to QR codes
info.item2: Higher error correction level allows reading damaged QR codes
info.item3: Adjust size to generate QR codes for different purposes
info.item4: Generated QR codes can be downloaded as PNG images

wifiQr.title: WiFi QR Code Generator
wifiQr.description: Share WiFi networks via QR code
wifiQr.subtitle: Convert WiFi network information to QR code for easy sharing

info.title: How to Use
info.item1: Enter WiFi network name (SSID) and password
info.item2: Click Generate QR Code button to create QR code
info.item3: Scan QR code with smartphone camera to connect to WiFi automatically
info.item4: WiFi QR codes may not be supported on some older devices
info.item5: For security, only share generated QR codes with trusted people
